attributes.action: Get the local council to pay for a scatepark to be built in Catterick Garrison.
attributes.additional_details: Need to start a petition to get the funds for a scatepark to be built in the Catterick area for youngsters.
attributes.background: In Catterick Garrison there is nothing to do for youngsters. I think a skate park should be built because it will open somewhere for the youth to go which wouldn’t cost them anything. It will also open opportunities for the youth to learn something new. E.g. how to do tricks on scateboards.

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on the local council, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.

You could raise this with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
